column4: hey guys big noob here anyone can help me with wireless setings?
cant get my card to run on ubuntu?
desktop a dwl-g520 with atheros chipset
during the instalation the card is recognised and im prompted to enter wep and other information
but after the install the card isnt there anymore -_-
i will try for the 100th time lol
no, got ubuntu server
really strange iwconfig doesnt list the card, even tho it was there at install
yeah
i dont know, just the fresh install from the server version of ubuntu
what does ip a  shows?
on l0 ?
only lo ?
yes
you have loaded the drivers for your specific wifi card?
no
do it anyways
which chip?
you need to respond with my nick or else im going to miss it
ok sorry
would you have guessed that lots of these soho routers have linux in them as the kernel?  :)
